name: graphite-web-frontend
description: Graphite's web app frontend. Planned to be replaced by a native GUI written in Rust in the future.
author: Graphite Authors <contact@graphite.rs>
browserslist: > 1.5%, last 2 versions, not dead, not ie 11, not op_mini all, not ios_saf < 13

scripts.start: npm run build-wasm && concurrently -k "vite" "npm run watch:wasm" || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm-prod && vite build || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.tauri:dev: echo 'Make sure you build the wasm binary for tauri using `npm run tauri:build-wasm`' && vite
scripts.print-building-help: echo 'Graphite project failed to build. Did you remember to `npm install` the dependencies in `/frontend`?'
scripts.print-linting-help: echo 'Graphite project had lint errors, or may have otherwise failed. In the latter case, did you remember to `npm install` the dependencies in `/frontend`?'

//: Notes about dependency issues and incompatibilities should be added here when needed.
